title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: As the title said, I need someone to build a web page in which visitors can check the crypto price, marketcap, volume etc in Bangladeshi Taka. Every amount will be displayed in Bangladeshi Taka. This will be applicable for a few coins as start but later, with the result, we will consider increasing number of coins.You can PM me here or telegram- @LT_Mouse
